title: Ada 2012 bindings to SDL 2
author: based2
content: readme.md sdlada is new variable thickness ada 2012 binding sdl 2.x.y (http://www.libsdl.org). means things arewrapped they need be a thicker binding those things can be imported, are. will still a need use conditional compilation the various platforms there be platform specifics cannot abstracted leanly, this be reduced much possible. bindings are generated the specific parts sdl ada does already support , i.e.threads are bound ada has tasking support built .usage, licence & attributionsdlada is distributed under same zlib licence the sdl libary is. may this library in way like whether free commercial. would add whilst don't to state your game uses library, would prefer if did, fact, 'm asking to.building are number variables can set control compilation:sdl_platform = be set one the following values: linux, windows, macosx, ios androidsdl_mode = be of: debug release. defaults debug.sdl_build = be of: static shared. defaults a statically built library.cd build/gnat sdl_platform=linux sdl_build=static sdl_mode=releaseinstallation sdl_platform=linux sdl_build=static sdl_mode=release destdit=/myprefix installcopyrightcopyright (c) 2013-2016 luke . guestwarning!!! have tried model types correctly, remember sdl is c library some things may make sense. pleasefile bug report you this library find a type does cover enough values cross-platform .possible
